Double Punch/Nemesis 
Enforcer/Oblitercon/Shuko/Unitron/Hades/Anubis/Sixshot/Scattershot:





Sixshot walked beside Koga Shuko, nearing the Newcomer's base.  
"Master Shuko, I am still strong.  I have my arm here," he said, lifting his 
detached arm, "but I am still powerful.  Requesting permission to strafe the 
Ark."

"Granted.  Make them pay.  Test your com."

"Yes, Master Shuko." Sixshot bowed.  Activating his com, he spoke into it.  
Shuko only heard Sixshot in person, not over the com.  All he heard was 
static.

"Slag!  A jamming station.  Switch your frequencies to the next frequency we 
had planned."  they all did so.  <Set, Set!> Shuko yelled into his com, 
hoping Set had remembered to keep all the frequencies they were going to use 
open to his com systems.

Sixshot transformed into his space fighter mode, launching in the air towards 
the Ark, arming his missiles and bombs, as well as his lasers.

---

Shuko, Unitron, Hades, Anubis, and Serpentor all stepped into their base.

"Mercenaries, stand guard here.  When we are repaired, we will give you your 
pay, as I have done in the past with your services." Shuko said, each of the 
robots going into the CR room and getting into chambers and pools.

===

-All systems at 100%.  Energon infusion complete.  Energy levels at 100%, and 
slowly decreasing- Shockwave's internal computer told him.
"My supplies are down to 18 kilos of energon.  Only enough to keep me at 75% 
efficiency by the next lunar rotation of this pitiful planet.  I must find a 
suitable energon source." Shockwave walked through the forest, entering what 
would be known as Germany in the future, near a city that would be named 
Munich.  Seeing a proto-human, he walked right by it, not doing what other 
"evil" robots like him would do.  Shoot it.  He was to smart for that.  Why 
shoot a worthless organic creature, that would surely drain his energy 
levels.  He continued to walk.  After all, it conserved more energy with just 
walking then being in his space fighter mode.

===

Scattershot watched Ultra Optimus leave.  <Zardus, it's Scattershot.  That 
Maximal Autobot left!  DevilDuer went off to fight him, but he's scrapped.  
I'm comin' back to base.  You want me to bring DevilDuer's decapitated head 
on a pike so you can examine it better?>

===

Double Punch continued to watch.  He sighed. Maybe Hell Beast didn't recieve 
his last com transmission.  

<LORD HELLBEAST!  This is Double Punch.  I'm spying on the Maxis.  If we 
attacked now, they'd all die.  The Ark is in a really bad condition.  At the 
rate they're going (with two or three people repairing only) the ship won't 
be back up for another 8 months.  The troops are in dismay...and I smell 
rebellion in the air.  Do you wish for me to stay here and keep an eye on the 
situation and report back to you periodically?>

Double Punch ancipated a reply, in his stealth mode so no one could see him, 
Manterror and Injector in a small cave below him since they were visible 
otherwise.

===

Nemesis Enforcer reached the Alliance base, about to get into a CR chamber, 
hit on the back of the head from behind with the butt of a rifle.

"Not before us, sucker." Firestarter said.  After everyone else got into a CR 
chamber, Firestarter began to get in, putting away his rifle, when a pair of 
hands pulled him and threw him into the wall.

"What was that, loserbot?" Nemesis joked poorly, knocking Firestarter to the 
ground with a mean left hook.  Two kicks to the face knocked Firestarter out, 
Nemesis getting into a CR chamber chuckling.
